businessContext.description: E-commerce platform serving retail customers with high traffic during business hours

endpoints.name: Get Product Details
endpoints.description: Customer-facing product page endpoint. Critical for sales conversion.

endpoints.name: Add to Cart
endpoints.description: Transaction endpoint. Directly impacts revenue. Must be highly available.

endpoints.name: Checkout
endpoints.description: Payment processing endpoint. Highest criticality. Requires strict SLA.

endpoints.name: Get User Profile
endpoints.description: User profile endpoint. Important but not critical for core business.

endpoints.name: Search Products
endpoints.description: Product search functionality. High impact on user experience and discovery.

endpoints.name: Get Analytics
endpoints.description: Internal analytics endpoint. Low priority, can tolerate higher latency.
